metadata.title: CVE-2023-38888 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Dolibarr ERP CRM v.17.0.1 and beforeallows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information and executearbitrary code via the REST API module, related toanalyseVarsForSqlAndScriptsInjection and testSqlAndScriptInject.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
